comment: many enzymes also have delta5-delat4-isomerase activity (see ec 5.3.3.1 or R02644) and convert 3beta-hydroxy-delta5-steroid into 3-oxo-delta4-steroid. general reaction (see R01837, R02216, R02499, R02840, R03327, R04163, R04678, R04849 and R09920)
name: 3beta-Hydroxy-delta5-steroid:NAD+ 3-oxidoreductase
